title: Council Decision of 27 April 1998 concerning the further extension of Common Position 96/635/CFSP on Burma/Myanmar
header:
COUNCIL DECISION of 27 April 1998 concerning the further extension of Common Position 96/635/CFSP on Burma/Myanmar (98/303/CFSP)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
recitals:
,
Having regard to the Treaty on European Union, and in particular Article J.2 thereof,
Having regard to Common Position 96/635/CFSP of 28 October 1996 defined by the Council on the basis of Article J.2 of the Treaty on European Union, on Burma/Myanmar (1),
Having regard to Decision 97/688/CFSP (2), which extended that common position for a period of six months until 29 April 1998,
Whereas, in the light of point 6 of Common Position 96/635/CFSP, that common position should be further extended,
main_body: Common Position 96/635/CFSP is hereby further extended until 29 October 1998.
This Decision shall be published in the Official Journal.
attachments:
Done at Luxembourg, 27 April 1998.
For the Council
The President
R. COOK
(1) OJ L 287, 8.11.1996, p. 1.
(2) OJ L 293, 27.10.1997, p. 1.
